scenarios.title: The Offer
scenarios.setup: Alok is a rising star in the cricket world, known for his exceptional batting skills. During a tournament, he is approached by a stranger who claims to have a performance-enhancing substance that can guarantee him a spot in the national team. The stranger assures Alok that the substance is undetectable and many top players are already using it. Alok is torn between his ambition and his commitment to fair play.

dialogue.speaker: Stranger
dialogue.line: This substance will make you unbeatable on the field. You'll be a hero and a legend in the cricket world.

dialogue.speaker: Alok
dialogue.line: I'm not sure, I've always believed in playing fair and square.

choices.consequence: Alok's career takes off, but he lives in constant fear of being caught.
Alok's career progress may be slower, but he maintains his integrity and self-respect.

scenarios.title: The Consequences
scenarios.setup: Alok decides to take the substance and his career skyrockets. However, he soon realizes that he is not alone in using performance-enhancing substances and that many other players are also involved. He starts to feel the pressure of maintaining his secret and the fear of being caught by the anti-doping authorities.

dialogue.speaker: Teammate
dialogue.line: Alok, we need to talk about the substance you're using. I know what it is and I'm worried about the risks.

dialogue.speaker: Alok
dialogue.line: I don't know what you're talking about. I'm just playing well, that's all.

choices.consequence: Alok's secret is at risk of being exposed, and he may face serious consequences.

choices.option: Stop using the substance and confess
choices.consequence: Alok may face a temporary ban, but he can redeem himself and start anew.

scenarios.title: The Quiz
scenarios.setup: Alok is approached by a WADA official who wants to educate him about the dangers of doping and the importance of fair play. The official asks Alok a series of questions to test his knowledge about WADA rules and banned substances.

dialogue.speaker: WADA Official
dialogue.line: Alok, can you tell me what the main goal of WADA is?

dialogue.speaker: Alok
dialogue.line: I think it's to promote fair play and protect the integrity of sports.

quiz.question: What is the name of the list that contains all the banned substances in sports?
What is the penalty for a first-time doping offense?
What is the purpose of the Therapeutic Use Exemption (TUE) system?
options: To allow athletes to use banned substances
To provide an exemption for athletes with medical conditions
To punish athletes who use banned substances
quiz.answer: To provide an exemption for athletes with medical conditions

quiz.question: What is the name of the organization that oversees anti-doping efforts in international sports?

passed.result: Alok demonstrates excellent knowledge about WADA rules and banned substances.

failed.result: Alok lacks knowledge about WADA rules and banned substances, putting his career at risk.

scenarios.title: The Road to Redemption
scenarios.setup: Alok decides to stop using the substance and confess to the authorities. He faces a temporary ban, but he is grateful for a second chance. He works hard to redeem himself and prove that he can succeed without doping.

dialogue.speaker: Coach
dialogue.line: Alok, I'm proud of you for taking responsibility for your actions. You have a long road ahead of you, but I believe in you.

dialogue.speaker: Alok
dialogue.line: Thank you, Coach. I won't let you down again.

choices.option: Continue on the path of redemption
choices.consequence: Alok's hard work pays off, and he becomes a role model for young athletes.
Alok's career ends in disappointment, and he regrets his decision to dope.

scenarios.title: The Legacy
scenarios.setup: Alok's career comes to an end, and he looks back on his journey. He realizes that the decisions he made, both good and bad, have shaped him into the person he is today.

dialogue.speaker: Reporter
dialogue.line: Alok, you've had a remarkable career. What do you hope your legacy will be?

dialogue.speaker: Alok
dialogue.line: I hope that my story will serve as a reminder that fair play and integrity are essential in sports. I'm proud of the person I've become, and I hope to inspire young athletes to make the right choices.
